仾字的基本解释

仾
dī
古同“低”。

仾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dī］
［《廣韻》都溪切，平齊，端。］
亦作“仾1”。
(1)与“高”相对。谓由下至上距离小。
(2)指低下之处。
(3)向下；向下垂。
(4)指使向下，放低。
(5)低于。
(6)低下。指身份地位、才能见识等。
(7)谓质量差。
(8)坏，恶劣。
(9)声音小。
(10)低廉，便宜。
(11)低落，消沉。
(12)驻屯。
(13)见“低回”、“低遲”。

仾字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　仾； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页95第01
俗低字。

仾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
仾字的起名意思

暂无。

Yao
Basic explanation of words
Yao
dī
Gu Tong is "low".
Yao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dī］
["Guangyun" all stream cut, flush, end. ]
Also known as "仾1".
(1) Contrast with "high". It is said that the distance from bottom to top is small.
(2) Refers to the low point.
(3) Down; droop down.
(4) Instruct downward and lower.
(5) Less than.
(6) Low. Refers to status, ability, knowledge, etc.
(7) It is said that the quality is poor.
(8) Bad, bad.
(9) The sound is small.
(10) Inexpensive and cheap.
(11) Low and depressed.
(12) Stationed in the village.
(13) See "low return" and "low latency".
Yao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　仾; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 95 01
Vulgar words.
